name: Shapes (itch) (waldohatesyou)
description: This project was meant to create a game to teach middle-school age children algebra. The game involved the use of shapes moving around in order to illustrate the mechanics of algebraic operations. The game was designed in Unity3D and programmed in C#. Extensive playtesting was performed with test subjects and the data from these play tests was recorded using Google Forms. The data from these play tests was analyzed using Python 3.
